overview: Bridgette is sent to Earth by her father. Satan, to enlist new souls for Hell. Her first assignment is two Senators from Washington D.C. And what an ASS-signment it turns out to be! The poor little Devil runs into some hellacious problems. So, she conjures up a couple of Hellions to do her dirty deeds for her. And she knows every dirty, nasty, twisted temptation to get the job done.
title: Bridgette's Hellions
